website_summaries.verdict: A value-priced mini fridge with all of the features of more costly models including a chiller compartment with ice tray.
pros: Affordable and energy-efficient with a reversible door and freezer compartment
Similar to the Midea but comes with a lower price
cons: Compartments on the door are flimsy, and items frequently fall out of them when opening the door

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm rooms
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's dorm room at University of the South. It is 1/2 the size of regular small compressor-less refrigerator. 1.7 CuFt and can fit under most dorm beds that are on risers or under a dorm desk. Holds enough stuff for any college kid. Comes in black or white and has really good ratings. My daughter loves it. Amazon has the best price and it ships with Prime also. A college student can get a trial subscription free with a college email address. I ordered hers on a Sunday night and she had it on Tuesday with my Prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: Gheadsr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office!
customer_reviews.text: I worried I would have problems setting this up in my office, but it is lightweight enough for an old woman to lift, and all you have to do is plug it in. It keeps everything ice cold and is virtually noiseless. Every now and again, I hear it kick in, but not loudly. By the way, the box was torn open and all dinged up when I got it. It looked like it had taken a bad fall. However, the refrigerator was so securely packaged in a box within the box that it didn't suffer any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality through the years
customer_reviews.text: A few years back I was working in Dutch Harbor and bought one of these from Alaska Ship Supply. Worked fine even through super dusty conditions. Recently purchased this 'fridge for the man cave to hold tasty beverages, wrapped sandwiches, Stoli & Jaeger in the freezer etc. Set up is a breeze. like the last purchase I let the unit come down to temp before I loaded items. The unit is very quiet, you can barely notice it when it fires up. Once again, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wetherill

customer_reviews.title: Still working, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frig years ago for my nephew who is a truck driver. Great price and a good amount of food can be stored. The frig is still working and was purchased 5 yrs ago
customer_reviews.author: Quiana

customer_reviews.title: Great Frig
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Haier refrigerator for my son to use in truck. He drives a eighteen wheeler and is on the road 5 days a week. It is a new truck so it has all the regular outlets like your home does.Had it about a year now workes great.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Smith

customer_reviews.title: A perfect unit for our environmental samples
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little refrigerator/freezer for our equipment room at work as a place to temporarily place environmental samples we collect that need to be kept cold or frozen. It is just the right size, fitting under our work table. The little freezer, which doesn't come with most refrigerators of this size, is just the right size. I also like the Energy Star rating, which is important to our environmental organization. Finally, it was delivered to my home in under 5 days in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chapman

customer_reviews.title: thank you...
customer_reviews.text: You are what you say...quiet, convenient and easy to use. I sent this to my friend's mother is 95 years old and wanted to have easy to eat snacks throughout the day. This unit has worked well for her. It is also one of the few small refrigerators that has a quiet motor....check this out before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little refrigerator. It cools down fast and is very quiet. I purchased it for my office to store facial masks and keep cold water on hand for my patients. My only complaint is the lack of space, which is mainly on the door, and a small amount of shelf space.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R.

customer_reviews.title: refrigerator for husband
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his garage work table. He thinks it is the greatest idea..and he feels very special, although I don;t see him in and out of the garage anymore .. he is spoiled! Now he has a tv next to the refig. too...!
customer_reviews.author: Amiee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an very old office refrigerator that died. This one is quiet, efficient, and cold. Strongly recommended if you need one with these specific storage features.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and fits well in my office. Keeps everything cold and the freezer is cold enough to make ice cubes, if not just a little small, but I don't use the freezer part so no big deal. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaCarol

customer_reviews.title: Great little refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator fits under the countertop in my lab and has been in steady use for 3 months. So far it has been working as described. No problems. I recommend it for small dorm or office use. Seems to be pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: bought for my son at college
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son at college. His dorm room isn't that big and he needed something which would fit. This does and keeps food and vitamins cool. A good buy, especially with free amazon shipping.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago it still works like it should doesn't use much power and fits all my personal bedroom food and drinks or anything else u want to put in there
customer_reviews.author: kory

customer_reviews.title: A Spacious Little Box
customer_reviews.text: Nice little box. I have it at my desk. It is spacious enough for sodas, 3 boxes of Lean Cuisine entrees. Yogurts (6) a couple of small containers - like salad or fruit. I recommend this little box
customer_reviews.author: DORNONs

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have no problems with the fridge. Does just what its suppose to do (keep stuff cold ) Inside is just like picture shown and cools very well. has tiny freezer to keep ice cubes in or anything else that can fit in that space.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Renfrew

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a while. This frig has no problem getting cold. Door is not reversible (opens from the right-hinges on left side) or it would have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Crusher

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great. Very quite. My only concern is I wish I had gone to the next size up, you really cant fit much into this frig.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rock

customer_reviews.title: Good mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Quality fridge with the perfect size. Freezer portion freezes well and all other areas maintain that cold chill you expect from a fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce Aceman

customer_reviews.title: overstock warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I got this for one of my employees. He really likes it and it fit where we needed it to... Although I don't work there anymore so I can't say if it still works or not.
customer_reviews.author: ArchieZer0

customer_reviews.title: Haier is great room fridge
customer_reviews.text: Fridge serves my purposes, runs well and fits into my room space nicely It holds the things that I need at night when I do not wish to disturb the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Fridge/ Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office. I only wish I could have changed the door to open the other way. Works well, but I should have paid attention to this detail.
customer_reviews.author: JSTPburg

customer_reviews.title: College cute
customer_reviews.text: Good for the size that my daughter needs for her college dorm room. Smaller than the usual but was clean and will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its terrible in that it stopped working 30 days after being ...
customer_reviews.text: Its terrible in that it stopped working 30 days after being plugged in and Haier has not responded to my request to return. I don't recommend this product or this company.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Huff

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small unit for my fresh veggies in the office. This one is great, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Grannie

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son who is in college and got an awesome price on it (72.95, free shipping). No where else did the price come close to this. I did notice the price increased closer to Christmas so I am happy I purchased it early. He is using it and said it is perfect for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wells

customer_reviews.title: Bought for college dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a college dorm room fridge. My son liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small fridge upstairs to keep food and drinks while I was recovering from knee surgery, and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cljuster

customer_reviews.title: good for small places
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves it. Got it for him as he has a small room to put it into. He oves getting ice from it
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Rimer

customer_reviews.title: The best deal, for your buck...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the price the best, but I love the qualityt of Haier appliances. We use it as a secondary frig for our son (2 years old). We store his milk and other essentials he needs at night. It is compact enough to fit under a standard size computer desk. Great buy! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: jpcalinao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it for my wife to use at her office; loves it.
customer_reviews.author: virgil

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: the compressor gets very hot, the inside is room temperature. I disputed the payment. im waiting for instructions on how to return it
customer_reviews.author: roger fessenbecker

customer_reviews.title: Not the most powerful fridge, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge is quiet and fairly lightweight. It isn't able to keep up if the ambient temperature gets too high, but it's inexpensive and works for a few months now so it gets 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Blanos

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 year and one day it just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: isayama

customer_reviews.title: Fridge buy
customer_reviews.text: The buy went fine. The fridge is great. Is a little bit smaller than i was expected but still fine for its price.
customer_reviews.author: panagiotis

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size. It's just what I needed. Works good. Looks like its gonna last a long time.I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Costumer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Can't Get the temperature right to keep popsicle cold and fridge not freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product shipped in only two days and it has more space then I imagined. Freezer is bigger than expected and the thermostat will keep your items very cold even on #4(out of 7). I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Iduoze

customer_reviews.title: it works great, not to noisy
customer_reviews.text: Used in my fathers room, it works great, not to noisy,
customer_reviews.author: cmyguts

customer_reviews.title: refrigerator for snacks
customer_reviews.text: Work great for snacks including small frozen things. Must set on counter or have a base unless you get on you knees to access.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Reil

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Awsome. I purchased this about a month ago and I have no complaints. The noise is minimal, it gets nice and cold and best of all, the freezer actually freezes!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge for my store
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge! I needed it for my store since they didn't have one. Price range and size was perfect! Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Jen Smail

customer_reviews.title: refridgerator
customer_reviews.text: this is an absolute great value....i do really like it and it keeps all my items fresh and cold....it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karina Karrus

customer_reviews.title: Small but very useful
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. Even though it is small, it is very useful considering the cheap price. I think this is for a person who lives alone. Color is white so very beautiful. I recommand this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: JAE IK KEUM

customer_reviews.title: They love them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for friends going off to college. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Bennett

customer_reviews.title: refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: this refrigerator is great for your office. it fits anywhere and has a small freezer inside with a small ice tray.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: it's cold and quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's a good one for dorm because it's very quiet and keeps everything very cold. I bought it with my roommate.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some parts of the refrigerator were dented, which made me frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Maria Claro

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing
customer_reviews.text: Shopped only one day. work so nice. I loved it, It's also have freeze box inside. such a nice thing for only this price
customer_reviews.author: zian zhou

customer_reviews.title: Warranty not Clear
customer_reviews.text: The warranty is not clear. It says smaller appliances get 2 way shipping, but isn't clear whether this refrigerator is considered a smaller appliance or a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Tibor W

customer_reviews.title: good option for a small space
customer_reviews.text: it's a good small refrigerator. the space inside is compact so dont expect your whole office to be able to fit their lunches in there. the railing on the door slides around a lot so it's not that secure, just be careful what you put in the door. as long as you know that you won't be able to fit too much in there, it's a good buy for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sooner than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Just enough space for my son's college dorm room. The freezer compartment allows him to have ice cream bars and sandwiches. Overall it is small enough to fit in a crowed dorm room. Arrived sooner than promised. A pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingmom

customer_reviews.title: Came dinged up and dented...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with some dings and dents. Usually can "contact seller" but for this one I dont have that option. Im not sure who to message about this issue. The unit itself looks like its working ok but I would like to speak to someone about reimbursement before giving more stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sylert

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this item arrived damaged. The packing box didn't show any damage, but the fridge looked like it had been squashed. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda C

customer_reviews.title: Good price but extremely loud
customer_reviews.text: Good price. But very very noisy though perhaps this was because the item was delivered damaged so a poor custo er experience overall. Got it for my daughters college dorm room and didnt notice the damage until that time at which point a return would have been difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Buttrick

customer_reviews.title: Dead within a year
customer_reviews.text: worked great till it died..almost a full year!! Use to have an older Haier fridge for years..built better I guess. On to finding another. hth
customer_reviews.author: Brad  taylor

customer_reviews.title: Small and loud
customer_reviews.text: It's compact size did not make it a good choice for the dorm room. From the photo it looked bigger from the photos. Once it was plugged in it was very loud and would not work well in a small area. Not thrilled. Price was similar to larger sizes and did not feel like it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: VA123

customer_reviews.title: Already in garbage
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of listening to it kick on and off it quit! Bad investment So I wated 114 dollars plus tax and I would never suggest it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge literally only last 1 year and died. We bought this in May 2012 and it died in May 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Undertone

customer_reviews.title: return
customer_reviews.text: Would Like to return had a misunderstanding of what it was
customer_reviews.author: Dina Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Cost Prohibitive to Return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator to store breastmilk in my office but, after I ordered, I learned that there was already a dedicated refrigerator for such purposes. I thought it would be simple to return the refrigerator but Amazon is saying that the return charge will likely be $35 dollars! That is nearly half of what I paid for this item and I am not willing to pay that much for it. I am really dissappointed. I shop at Amazon all the time and rarely have returns. I thought it would be a much more user friendly procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Died in a month, Haier = horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Within a month this unit just died. I contacted Haier America for customer service and the company referred me to a carry-in service center which I delivered it to. The service shop promptly returned the unit as not reparable. When I contacted Haier America again, I found myself in a vortex "we are still waiting for input from our engineering department, we'll contact you within 3 business days...", again, and again, ad nauseam. I am still in the process, and it is nearing a 2-month experience. Unsat. I’ll provide an update soon, based on the results of my latest phone call this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Shamus

customer_reviews.title: Fridge good, freezer-ette not so much
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 3 months during a kitchen renovation. It kept things cold, but the tiny freezer never worked quite right and is a little drippy. So I just used the fridge, even though I had to mop a little water off of everything I took out. It holds a surprising amount, so I got by with nothing more for a whole summer. I used the Dry-Erase feature once (ha - didn't know it had it until I unpacked the box), but my note didn't come off of the door very well - maybe I'll try some kind of cleaner when I feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonbon

customer_reviews.title: Haier Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I like the minifridge just fine. It was cheep, I had no problems with the shipping as other reviewers had, it keeps my food cold, is pretty quiet, the freezer compartment works, and I like the adjustable temperature dial. With the effectiveness of the freezer compartment, I found that I didn't need to keep the dial past its 4 out of 7 settings. My only complaint is that I wish there was more space on the bottom compartment. For the price, I think the mini fridge was overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Ice compartment doesn't function well
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. Can't keep ice cream in freezer compartment because fridge cycles through freezing-moderately cold cycles, so the ice cream continuously melts and resolidified. If you just need something to keep things cool, worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: NeededAClock

customer_reviews.title: Great little frig and freezer!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take cross country with us. Only half the motels had refrigerators. Yes, we looked pretty weird carrying this in and out of our motel room, but, hey, it was just what we needed! We had a few small bags of ice in it while driving to keep our food cold. We were able to keep everything fresh. We also bought a little one burner electric thing to cook our meals with in our room
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fridge, I've had it for a little over a month and so far so good, its quiet and keeps items very cold I even had to turn the settings down to keep my waters from freezing. The freezer also works great I have been able to keep ice cream bars in there with no problem.This is a great product for the low price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigg Mo

customer_reviews.title: Cold & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator for my cubicle at work. For the past two months or so, it has functioned flawlessly, keeps my lunch and drinks cold (even frozen foods) and has not made any discernable noise at all. I find I can fit just about anything I need to inside and it has been very reliable. The box was a bit torn up during shipping (amazon ships the product box alone), but the contents were fine and the unit had no blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Miech

customer_reviews.title: Died in a couple of months. Zero response from company support line.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well while it lasted but I was disappointed to see it die within 4 months. What made it worse is that I'm getting no response from Haier support team. They just don't seem to care about their products. I wouldn't recommend buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect College Fridge
customer_reviews.text: My daughter swears by this fridge, perfect for the dormitory, stores a lot. The only thing if you are looking for a big freezer this is not the one for you. But for midnight snackers and college students it is perfect for to store quick foods and drinks. It is small and compact in size and will not take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works great. We take this with us when camping in ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and works great. We take this with us when camping in "camper cabins" and it is sufficient for a family of four. Freezer freezes and refrigerator cools evenly, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for office / work use. It is big enough to put large drinks and multiple meals in, but small enough to not be in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful1

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my pop cold. Holds a half-case. The freezer compartment will freeze things. The case and door are metal. The back panel is foam-core cardboard. Fit and finish are acceptable, but hardly impressive. Many comments on small fridges focus on the noise. This unit sits in my very quiet office. When the compressor runs, it makes a quiet little sound, comparable to a fish-tank pump in volume when it first starts up, and getting quieter as it runs. It makes a quiet little shudder when the compressor shuts down a minute or so later. This unit is not annoying or distracting to me. Be warned, I think peoples' experience varies by unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Guntheroth

customer_reviews.title: Life on campus
customer_reviews.text: This is a really small refrigerator. Fits perfectly for living on campus and alone. Never used the freezer... The refrigerator works really well and is not noisy at all! I am so happy I bought it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taissa

customer_reviews.title: Small Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a s a gift and they said it was wonderful. It was easy to unpackaged and was shipped as new. It was for an 89 year old lady who needed something small for her room. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: alaska

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these several years ago. It lasted about 3yrs. I have a feeling this new one will last about as long. Works fine but makes some weird clunking sounds at times. If you turn it up too high it will freeze everything inside but it does the trick & we use it on the 2nd story of our house so we have drinks upstairs for us & kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these. 2 were for my daughters to take to college and one for my husband's office. We bought them in August. By the end of September, 2 of them were not working (one college and one in office). Worthless pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "Personal" size Fridge/Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Compact size of fridge/freezer perfect for cramped office with no room to spare. Clean look, spacious (for its size)two-shelf design with door storage for canned goods, as well as ice-cube compartment. Very reasonably priced. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Haier Regrigerator/Freezer
customer_reviews.text: This Haier replaced my office refrigerator but it did not have a freezer. This one works quite well but does not have as much room as the other. The freezer is perfect for the mini ice cubes and frozen lunches but half of the bottom of the fridge is obstructed.
customer_reviews.author: Arj Myers

customer_reviews.title: Haier mini-fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge seems to be working just great. I keep it in my office to keep lunch fresh and cold. The little freezer compartment with a mini ice cube tray works great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John V. Madormo

customer_reviews.title: Best minifridge I've dealt with
customer_reviews.text: Fridge has lasted me since june 2013 and is still kicking. Works as an entire freezer or an entire fridge very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This package came very fast, is light and perfect for a bedroom. The price can't be beat either, in fact it's cheaper on here that getting one at name brand department stores which is always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Terra V.

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: regret this purchase because of its height but it works well and it was nicely priced. Ive had it for over a year and it keeps my crap cold and isn't that all I can ask of it?
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Compack
customer_reviews.text: This fridge has all the right stuff, it can get very cold and it has the right amount of space, great for the "Man Cave" "
customer_reviews.author: gr8love4u2

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Once you set the freezer settings right it does it's job nicely. It took a little time to make it - Not too Cold, Not too Warm. - But I found the right setting it's been working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSky

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it keeps foods and drinks cold, it will freeze also. I can only give it four stars because it occasionall makes a loud clunking noise.
customer_reviews.author: GIGI

customer_reviews.title: Dinky, efficient, reliable
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for our guest room. Great for a bottle of wine, a little ice, and their not having to come ask me at midnight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cieloha

customer_reviews.title: What I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as described. Would buy another one. Good price too. And it get very cold. Good for my Pepsi.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok fridge- works well but it also makes mkuch more noise than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Porat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a year. Lots of places charge $20 to recycle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weltha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit noisy and drips from freezer to often.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great office fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid, long lasting machine. It came in perfect shape and will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J. Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge has held up like a champ for the past year or so and it shows no sign of letting up. It's nice and quiet, too. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: Great Frige for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Fits under my desk and has plenty of space for drinks, lunch, yogurt and snacks. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camping cabin
customer_reviews.text: Space saver, yet holds anything we need for just a couple nights while camping on weekends. Freezer part is good.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltywoman

customer_reviews.title: Great for my office
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it holds as much as the picture makes it look but it's perfect for my office and what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things ICY
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing, I've had it about a month and its kept things icy cold... i've had to turn down the thermostat a bit to keep that from happening but overall great lil fridge for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kolnan

customer_reviews.title: Great under the desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office. It was light weight to carry from the parking lot and fits mini ice trays. It is a bit small on the left side top shelf. I can't fifi my lunch box in it so I have to take the food out every day. Other than that is does a great job keeping things cold and freezing mini ice cubes. The only drw back is that one or two cubes never freezes. Not a deal breaker. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: It is a good companion in the office.
customer_reviews.text: It is as cool as cucumber in the hottest weather. It is big enough for the daily drinking bottles. It is as quiet as you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Zhihao Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Barely lasted a year, not counting summer. Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kat in Sacto

product_meta.title: Haier HCR17W 1.7 Cubic Feet Refrigerator/Freezer, White
product_meta.description: Ideal for dorm rooms, bar units and other locations that require compact refrigerator storage is the Haier 1.7-cubic feet. Compact refrigerator in white has a full-width shelf that slides out smoothly to offer easy access to your refrigerated goods. The refrigerator's full-width and half-width door shelves offer extra storage space, and its 2-liter door bottle storage is great for juice containers, soda bottles and other 2-liter items.
feature_bullets: Half-width freezer compartment with ice cube tray
Full-width and half-width door storage shelf
